history.proof: intro H. unfold pm_ext_eq. unfold pm_ext_eq in H. intros p. destruct (pos_S_inv p) as [H0 | [q Hq]]. - subst. rewrite !pm_lift_fst. reflexivity. - subst. hauto use: pm_lift_nxt.

exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : nat r1, r2 : pos_map m n H : forall p : pos m, r1 p = r2 p q : pos m Unable to unify "r1 ?M1498 = r2 ?M1498" with "pm_lift r1 (pos_nxt q) = pm_lift r2 (pos_nxt q)".

original: intro H. unfold pm_ext_eq. unfold pm_ext_eq in H. intros p. destruct (pos_S_inv p) as [H0 | [q Hq]]. - subst. rewrite !pm_lift_fst. reflexivity. - subst. apply H.
